argument.name: format
argument.description: Optional. A character string that specifies the information to return. Values for Flag are:"V" = Version number (e.g. "5") "B" = Build number (e.g. "765") "E" = Edition (e.g. "Developers Edition", "Runtime", "Trial" etc.) (Not supported for V9 and above. Use a5_is_runtime()) "U" = Number of users licensed to use the product "K" = Serial number

page.description: Returns product information on the current version.
page.discussion: VERSION() returns the version number and other information about Alpha Five. If flag is NULL, returns the major version number. E.g "5".
page.example:
?version("B") = "1549" ?version("E") = "Developers edition" ?version("K") = "7284209783210627" ?version("U") = "5" ?version("V") = "6.0"
V9 and above: To determine if the Runtime or Run Engine is running. ?a5_is_runtime() = .F.
